modName: NEW WALLPAPERS For MMW HD 1080p randomizer - DRAGON Pack 1
summary:
News Wallpapers For main menu wallpaper replacer HD 1080p now with randomizer by hellstorm102.
21 new Wallpapers from Deviantartists.

Dragon Edition
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://e.serra2003.free.fr/nwdragons-head2.png[/img]

[img]http://e.serra2003.free.fr/dialog-warning.png[/img][color=#FF0000][b][size=5] IMPORTANT :[/size] [size=3] You need to download and install the \'Main menu wallpaper replacer\' mod by Hellstorm102 before install this mod. Download Main menu Wallpaper replacer : [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3708]HERE[/url] [/size][/b][/color]

[img]http://e.serra2003.free.fr/nwdragons-description.png[/img] 

Add 21 new wallpapers (or replace) to officials [b] \'Main menu wallpaper replacer\'[/b] wallpapers, randomly displayed at each start.
[b]SPECIAL PACK :[/b] DRAGONS Edition.

[b][size=5][color=#63FD22]UPDATES / CHANGELOG : [/color][/size][/b]

[b]1.2[/b] : 
[list]
[*][i]Non-replacer version available[/i]
[*][b]1280 x 1024 version available[/b]
[/list]

[b]1.1[/b] : 
[list]
[*][i]Remove \'T\' folder (Test folder, useless) => FIX \'Image T\' bug[/i]
[*][b]Replace 4 wallpapers with new dragons wallpapers.[/b]
[/list]


[img]http://e.serra2003.free.fr/screens.png[/img] 

[img]http://e.serra2003.free.fr/nwdragons-install.png[/img] 

First you need the [b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3708]Main menu wallpaper replacer HD 1080p now with randomizer MOD by hellstorm102[/url][/b]

Install [b][u]main menu wallpaper replacer [/u][/b] [color=#A6F900][/color]

Download and Unzip [i][b]NEW Wallpapers Dragons Pack[/b][/i]

Put the [i]\'[u][b]mainmenuwallpapers[/b][/u]\'[/i] folder in your [b]Data[/b] folder [size=1](Replace the original \'mainmenuwallpapers\' folder)[/size]

[b] Ex: [/b][i]D:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data[/i]

------------------- 

Mod Organizer users : Dont forget to set max priority for New Wallpapers.


[img]http://e.serra2003.free.fr/nwdragons-thanks.png[/img] 

Of course these paintings are not by me.
Thanks to all artists who produce this beautiful work.
I made this mod for me first so I didn\'t think to note all the artists names. (PM me If I forgot you)
the names I remember :

[center]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=1535027]Hellstorm102[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=3431896]LLFBandit[/url]
[url=http://murdockmcmackin.deviantart.com]MurdockMcMackin[/url]
[url=http://treijim.deviantart.com]treijim[/url]
[url=http://randis.deviantart.com]randis[/url]
[url=http://kerembeyit.deviantart.com]kerembeyit[/url]
[url=http://wanbao.deviantart.com]wanbao[/url]
[url=http://akizhao.deviantart.com]akizhao[/url]
[url=http://deligaris.deviantart.com]deligaris[/url]
[url=http://iacg.deviantart.com]IACG[/url]
[url=http://panico747.deviantart.com]Panico747[/url]
[url=http://moni158.deviantart.com]moni158[/url]
[url=http://slydog0905.deviantart.com]Slydog0905[/url]

Bethesda ...
[/center]

[img]http://e.serra2003.free.fr/nwdragons-other.png[/img] 
[img]http://e.serra2003.free.fr/shad1.png[/img]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10657]
[img]http://e.serra2003.free.fr/mini1.png[/img][/url][img]http://e.serra2003.free.fr/mini2.png[/img]
